import React from 'react' import { Allrestaurants, Restaurant } from '../../../interfaces/Restaurant' import { RestaurantDiv, RestaurantImg, RestaurantName } from '../ChefOfTheWeek/StyleChefDetails' import { RestaurantStatus, RestChefName, StatusSelector, TitleR } from './StylePopularRests' export default function AllRestaurants() { return (
RESTAURANTS All New Most Popular Open Now {/* {Allrestaurants.map((restaurant)=>( {restaurant.name} {restaurant.ChefName} ))} */} {filterRestaurants("Filter").map((restaurant:Restaurant) =>( {restaurant.name} {restaurant.ChefName} )) }
) } function filterRestaurants(status:string){ Allrestaurants.filter(restaurant => restaurant.Status===status) }
